keyFacts: The document is a DOJ OIG Investigations Division transcription request form for an audio interview of Tova Noel.
The audio interview was recorded on July 15, 2021, and is 1 hour, 33 minutes, and 14 seconds long.
The case number associated with the request is 2019010614.
The form includes references to systems or terms like SAMS, TRUVIEW, SENTRY, and SHU, which may be relevant to the investigation context.
The request was approved on July 20, 2021, with a requested turnaround time of 5 business days.
